info.narration: #0 is going into $0's containment unit to begin the task.

collection.name: The Red Shoes
collection.openText: The girl begged in tears. "Mister, please cut off my feet..."

observe.desc:
[ {<Footage from Corridor Camera Z3_493>
Employee <Redacted1>: So the work over there is all done? I have finished mine now. The little match girl is still in the same state. It’s so frustrating. Let's grab a cup of coffee at the lounge. Employee <Redacted2>: You know, <Redacted1> I’ve been thinking about something for a long time. <Redacted1>: Let’s talk in the lounge. I’m tired. Hey, why are you wearing shoes? Only work boots are allowed during work. <Redacted2>: That’s not important, <Redacted1>, the important thing is that we are alone right now. <Redacted1>: What the hell are you talking about! Listen, I'm gonna take a break in the lounge right now. Wait, what are you wearing? You didn't wear IT, did you? <Redacted2>: <Redacted1>, I liked you for a long time. <Redacted1>: Dammit, take it off right now. Do you realize what you’re doing right now? <Redacted2>: I thought about why you didn’t like me. It was because of Emily, wasn't? You were so busy checking out Emily that you didn't even notice me, right? <Redacted1>: Is that a weapon you're holding? And your ankles are bleeding, <Redacted2>, please take it off right now! <Redacted2>: So all I need to do is get rid of Emily! Wait a moment, it won’t take long. You just stay here. <Redacted1>: Please, don’t do this. Don't make me hurt you. <Redacted2>: If you wanted to stop me, you should have done that the day we first met.
<Redacted2> stunned <Redacted1> with the weapon and went into the lounge. Fortunately, no one else was harmed including Emily. <Redacted2> was soon removed from the company database. She was entirely aware of what she was doing. She admitted that the shoes only encouraged her to do what she always wanted. When she was suppressed by a response team, the shoes ran away, cutting itself off of her ankles in the process. It took a total of 23 minutes for it to be suppressed, contained, and returned to the containment unit. <Redacted2> died of a massive blood loss. <Redacted1> only sustained minor injuries but quit the job due to trauma.} ]

specialTipSize.specialTip: Inside $0's containment unit, #0 has gone insane. It remembers its previous owner. Employees with Temperance level 2 or less should not be assigned to $0.
When the work result was normal, $0's Qliphoth counter has decreased with a normal probability.
When the work result was bad, $0's Qliphoth counter has decreased with a high probability.
As $0's Qliphoth counter became zero, #0, whose Temperance level is low, went inside $0's containment unit in a trance. We named this phenomenon, "Enchantment."
After continuously attempting to converse with an employee who had been enchanted by $0, the employee seemed to return to normal again.
